mapper.select: SELECT q.uid, q.analysis, q.answer, q.chapter_id, q.content, q.question_type, q.course_id, q.review_point, q.year, q.score, q.subject_id, q.audit_status FROM tiku_question q WHERE q.chapter_id = #{chapterId}

SELECT q.analysis, q.answer, q.chapter_id, q.content, q.paper_id, q.question_type, q.review_point, q.score, q.course_id, q.uid, q.`year`, q.subject_id, q.audit_status FROM tiku_question q WHERE q.paper_id = #{paperId}

SELECT q.analysis, q.answer, q.chapter_id, (select c.name from tiku_chapter c where c.uid = q.chapter_id) as chapter_name, q.content, q.paper_id, q.question_type, q.review_point, q.score, q.course_id, (select c.name from tiku_course c where c.uid = q.course_id) as course_name, q.uid, q.`year`, q.subject_id, (select s.name from tiku_subject s where s.uid = q.subject_id) as subject_name, q.audit_status FROM tiku_question q
q.name like #{name}

SELECT q.uid, q.analysis, q.answer, q.chapter_id, (select c.name from tiku_chapter c where c.uid = q.chapter_id) as chapter_name, q.content, q.question_type, q.course_id, q.review_point, q.year, q.score, q.subject_id, q.audit_status FROM tiku_question q WHERE q.uid = #{uid}

SELECT q.uid, q.analysis, q.answer, q.chapter_id, (select c.name from tiku_chapter c where c.uid = q.chapter_id) as chapter_name, q.content, q.question_type, q.course_id, q.review_point, q.year, q.score, q.subject_id, q.audit_status FROM tiku_question q WHERE q.uid = #{uid} and q.audit_status = '1'
